long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of seeing irrelevant comments under every Twitter post? Since Twitter introduced monetization for verified accounts, users have been spamming posts with unrelated comments just to increase their visibility and earnings. This can clutter your experience and make it harder to focus on meaningful discussions.

This Chrome extension provides a simple solution: with the click of a button, you can hide all comments from verified accounts (those with blue checkmarks) on any Twitter post. This way, you can enjoy a cleaner, more relevant comment section without the distraction of spam.

We don't collect any data, and our extension runs on a simple algorithm, ensuring it won't put any extra load on your computer.

Features:
✓  Hide comments from Twitter verified accounts (blue checkmarks).
✓  Improve your browsing experience by filtering out spam and irrelevant content.
✓  Lightweight and easy to use.
